Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details: [[DM.Factions[faction_ClanDiamondShark],CLAN DIAMOND SHARK]] ISSUES [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[TBoneLoreBatchall],BATCHALL]], TAKES TWYCROSS! Outreach: After agreeing to depart per the terms of the Blair Atholl ceasefire, [[DM.Factions[faction_ClanJadeFalcon],Clan Jade Falcon]] left Twycross to Archer's Avengers who detached only their infantry and armor assets to garrison the planet. Seeing an opportunity, three [[DM.Factions[faction_ClanDiamondShark],Diamond Shark]] clusters issued a [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[TBoneLoreBatchall],batchall]] for possession of the world. Although the mixed command of the Avengers fought bravely, in the end they were all but destroyed by the [[DM.Factions[faction_ClanDiamondShark],Diamond Sharks]], who apparently seek to restore the disabled [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[TBoneLoreTrellshireHI],Trellshire Heavy Industries]] facility. Would you like to know more?

Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details: Leaked intelligence reports from the Operation Audacity task force in the Twycross area suggest that the old [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[TBoneLoreTrellshireHI],Trellshire]] facility is unlikely to be the sole reason for the [[DM.Factions[faction_ClanDiamondShark],Diamond Sharks]]' uncharacteristic aggression there. Unconfirmed reports indicate that the [[DM.Factions[faction_ClanDiamondShark],Diamond Sharks]] may have discovered a substance akin to their famed [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[TBoneLoreHarJel],HarJel]] in the Twycross system. If true, this discovery could further reinforce the Sharks' monopoly on the substance and vastly increase the strength of the "merchant clan."
